Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.piecewise

Class GenericPiecewiseOpImage<T extends PiecewiseTransform1DElement>

Object
PlanarImage
OpImage
PointOpImage
ColormapOpImage
GenericPiecewiseOpImage<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
RenderedImage, ImageImageN, PropertyChangeEmitter, PropertySource, WritablePropertySource
Direct Known Subclasses:
RasterClassifierOpImage
public class GenericPiecewiseOpImage<T extends PiecewiseTransform1DElement> extends ColormapOpImage
Images are created using the GenericPiecewise.CRIF inner class, where "CRIF" stands for ContextualRenderedImageFactory . The image operation name is "GenericPiecewise".
Author:
Simone Giannecchini - GeoSolutions

  • Constructor Details

    • GenericPiecewiseOpImage

      public GenericPiecewiseOpImage(RenderedImage image, PiecewiseTransform1D<T> lic, ImageLayout layout, Integer bandIndex, ROI roi, Range nodata, RenderingHints hints, boolean cobbleSources)
      Constructs a new RasterClassifier.
      Parameters:
      image - The source image.
      lic - The DefaultPiecewiseTransform1D.
      bandIndex - index used for defining the band to calculate
      roi - ROI used for reducing computation area
      nodata - Range used for defining NoData values
      hints - The rendering hints.
